Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and is worth $1,500,000 to me personally. Considering its immense worth and unique features, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential value it holds for you, while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
